Privacy Policy

Dollars And Life ("we," "us," "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. By using www.dollarsandlife.com, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

We may collect personal information and usage data through cookies, Google Analytics, and AdSense to enhance user experience and advertising.

How We Use Your Information

Your information helps us improve website functionality, provide targeted ads, and analyze user interactions.

Advertising and Cookies

We use cookies and similar technologies. To opt-out of personalized advertising, please visit Google Ads Settings.

User Rights

Depending on your jurisdiction, you have rights under GDPR, CCPA, or similar privacy regulations to access or delete your information.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Please check this page regularly to stay informed.

Contact Us

For privacy-related inquiries, email us at contact@dollarsandlife.com or mail us at Texas Connect LLC.
